I AM NOT SMART WITH GAME DOWNLOADS!!!!

Use a program called 'ImgBurn' very easy to use, once installed you can right click the ISO File and 'Burn Using IMGBurn' this will open the program and just put a Blank CD in and BURN!!

download it here http://download.imgburn.com/SetupImgBurn_2.3.2.0.exe
http://download.softpedia.com/dl/fd8b6ce0471fc863b180b5d4d82195cc/4676eae3/100027810/software/cd_dvd_tools/SetupImgBurn_2.3.2.0.exe
